name: ClayDy
description:
Hi! I'm CLAYDY, 

I will find your secret, the one deep down in your chest.

Play allllllll the way till the end to find my secret.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move around sometimes.

Hold SPACE with mouse to aim and ATTACK.

Tab to see from the point of view of your significant birdle.

Features:

- drug addiction (procedural)

- 5th person (1, 2, 3, 4, 5)

- added support for clay individuals

- pasta noodle

- procedurally generated pasta noodle
